channel.title: prepare on absolute-SQ
channel.description: Recent content in prepare on absolute-SQ

item.title: golang使用prepare操作postgresqlDB
item.description: 背景 从mysql转为pg，对增删改查的语法没太多变化，但预处理还是有些不同 Mysql _stmt,_:=mysql.db.Prepare("SELECT * FROM table WHERE a=? AND b=?") _stmt.Exec(a1,b1) Postgresql _stmt,_:=pg.db.Prepare("SELECT * FROM table WHERE a=$1 AND b=$2") _stmt.Exec(a1,b1)
